title: TheMuse.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes jobs from TheMuse.com via the public API. Configure category, paging, and polite crawling options.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Optional: start from a specific TheMuse listing URL (e.g. https://www.themuse.com/search/keyword/admin/date-posted/last_7d). If provided, keyword/location are ignored.

location.title: Location (optional)
location.description: Optional location filter used when constructing a search URL.

datePosted.title: Date posted filter
datePosted.description: Optional date filter segment used in TheMuse listing URLs. Examples: 'last_7d', 'last_30d'. Leave empty for no filter.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to 0 to collect all available jobs.

maxPages.title: Maximum number of pages
maxPages.description: Maximum pages to paginate. Set to 0 to paginate until empty.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, the actor will fetch job detail pages to extract full description and metadata.

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string to send with requests.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array or object map.
